text: James Badge Dale (born May 1, 1978) is an American actor. He is known for playing Chase Edmunds in 24, Robert Leckie in The Pacific, State Trooper Barrigan in Martin Scorsese's The Departed, Eric Savin in Iron Man 3, and Tyrone S. Woods in 13 Hours. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Manhattan
title: James Badge Dale
